title: Strengthening Patient Care Competencies: Knowledge Integration and Learning Strategy Design in Project-Based Organizations

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of project management and organizational operations, intermediate domain expertise
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Design knowledge integration strategies using cognitive social capital (shared vision) within project teams
Propose measures to strengthen relational social capital (trust) and emotional social capital (social interaction)
Establish an organizational-level implementation plan that simultaneously promotes exploratory and applied learning through knowledge integration
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
